alert.note: Alert for Eureka; Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 2:28PM PDT until August 11 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lander County in north central Nevada... West central Eureka County in north central Nevada... * Until 300 PM PDT. * At 228 PM PDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located 11 miles northeast of Grass Valley, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This cluster of severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Lander and west central Eureka Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
